Articles.Content:
Here is the plane: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7puvm2uthhr04h2/SP-042.craft?dl=0

I present today, fellow kerbaonauts, the ultra lightweight SP-042 ''traveller plane''.

-1 pilot.

-Autonomy enough to cross 3/4 of Kerbin before runing out of fuel, and with a carrier plane (will post file later) will cross whole kerbin and 1/4 more.

-Can travel at supersonic speed without afterburners continously.

-With afterburners reaches up to 950 m/s.

 

It took me 42 days (that's why it's called 042) to design it perfectly, about 34 different models tried the challenge of crossing whole kerbin with assistance of a carrier plane or 3/4 without it, but often they were not superlight, so here it is, enjoy and give feedback.

Welcome to the forum.

Your craft sharing thread has been moved to the craft sharing subforum. Cute little plane.
